Mit der Mediathek holst du dir Live TV und die TV-Sendungen des ZDF aufs Smartphone oder Tablet.
Du hast die heute-show am Freitagabend verpasst oder besitzt gar kein Fernsehgerät? Dank der ZDFmediathek kannst du dennoch auf das komplette Angebot des Zweiten Deutschen Fernsehens zugreifen – und das bequem per iOS-App. Ob du nun bereits ausgestrahlte TV-Serien und Filme zu einem späteren Zeitpunkt ansehen willst oder das Spiel deines Lieblingsvereins live auf dem Tablet verfolgen möchtest: Die Mediathek macht es möglich und überträgt das gewünschte Programm schnell und ohne Ruckeln auf dein mobiles Endgerät.

Natürlich kannst du die Mediathek auch über den Browser aufrufen. Allerdings bietet die iOS-App weitere praktische Features:

•	komfortabler, direkter Zugang und intuitives Layout
•	Merken einzelner Videos und TV-Sendungen
•	Erinnerungsfunktion: Benachrichtigung zu deiner Lieblingssendung
•	Offline schauen fast aller Videos
•	Zugriff auf deinen persönlichen Mein ZDF-Bereich von mehreren Devices
•	Wiedergabe aller Inhalte auf deinem TV über Chromecast oder AirPlay

LIVE-TV MIT ZUSATZFUNKTIONEN
Du bist großer Wintersportfan, wirst während des nächsten wichtigen Biathlon-Rennens aber gerade im Zug sitzen? Dank der ZDFmediathek kannst du den Kampf um die Podestplätze dennoch live verfolgen und verpasst keinen Fehlschuss und kein Überholmanöver. Rund um die Uhr sind die Livestreams des ZDF und seiner Partnersender direkt in der Mediathek-App verfügbar. Alles, was du dafür benötigst: Internetzugang, dein iPhone oder iPad und eventuell Kopfhörer.

ON-DEAMND-VIDEOS: FERNSEHEN, WANN DU MÖCHTEST
Lieblingssendung verpasst? Über die iOS-App hast du Zugriff auf die komplette ZDFmediathek und kannst das Anschauen dann nachholen, wenn es dir zeitlich passt. Mindestens für eine Woche nach Ausstrahlung sind die Filme oder Serien online verfügbar – viele Formate sogar noch länger. Du hast die Auswahl aus bis zu 30.000 On-Demand-Videos. In der Kategorie „Letzte Chance“ erhältst du einen Überblick über die Sendungen, die in Kürze offline gehen. Apropos offline: Falls du einmal längere Zeit keinen Zugriff aufs WLAN oder keine mobile Datenverbindung haben wirst, kannst du dich vorab mit deinen Favoriten eindecken. Bei fast allen Filmen und TV-Serien erlauben es die Nutzungsrechte nämlich, diese in der App offline anzuschauen.

INTERAKTIVES FERNSEHEN DANK SECOND SCREEN
Bei ausgewählten Sendungen – etwa bei vielen Sportübertragungen – liefert dir der ZDF Second Screen als Bestandteil der App nützliche Zusatzinformationen. So kannst du bei Live-Fußballspielen zwischen mehreren Kameraperspektiven wechseln oder auf Wiederholungen bestimmter Spielszenen sowie auf Statistiken zugreifen. 

MERKLISTE & CO.: DEINE PERSÖNLICHE MEDIATHEK
Es gibt TV-Sendungen, von denen du keine Folge verpassen möchtest? Merke dir diese Formate via App, damit dir keine Neuigkeit mehr entgeht! Du kannst dich dann per Push-Benachrichtigung auch an neue Folgen deiner Lieblingssendung erinnern lassen. Falls du nicht sofort dazu kommst: Auf deine persönliche Merkliste setzt du einfach alle Videos, die du später anschauen möchtest. Als registrierter Nutzer kannst du auf diese persönlichen Daten übrigens von jedem Gerät aus zugreifen, auf dem du die App der ZDFmediathek installiert hast.

summary.label:
A video app made just for kids
YouTube Kids was created to give kids a more contained environment filled with family-friendly videos on all different topics, igniting your kids’ inner creativity and playfulness. Parents and caregivers can guide the journey as your kids discover new and exciting interests along the way. Learn more at youtube.com/kids

A safer online experience for kids
We work hard to keep the videos on YouTube Kids family-friendly and use a mix of automated filters built by our engineering teams, human review, and feedback from parents to protect our youngest users online.  But no system is perfect and inappropriate videos can slip through, so we’re constantly working to improve our safeguards and offer more features to help parents create the right experience for their families.

Customize your child’s experience with Parental Controls
Limit screen time: Set a time limit for how long your kids can watch and help encourage their transition from watching to doing.
Keep up with what they watch: Simply check the watch it again page and you’ll always know what they’ve watched and the newest interests they’re exploring.
Blocking: Don’t like a video? Block the video or whole channel, and never see it again.
Flagging: You can always alert us to inappropriate content by flagging a video for review. Flagged videos are reviewed 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

Create individual experiences as unique as your kids
Create up to eight kid profiles, each with their own viewing preferences, video recommendations, and settings. Choose from “Approved Content Only” mode or select an age category that fits your child, “Preschool”, “Younger”, or “Older”.

Select the “Approved Content Only” mode if you want to handpick the videos, channels and/or collections that you’ve approved your child to watch. In this mode, kids won’t be able to search for videos. The “Preschool” Mode designed for kids 4 and under curates videos that promote creativity, playfulness, learning, and exploration. The “Younger” Mode allows kids 5-8 to explore their interests in a wide variety of topics including songs, cartoons, and crafts. While our “Older” Mode gives kids 9 and up the chance to search and explore additional content such as popular music and gaming videos for kids.

All kinds of videos for all kinds of kids
Our library is filled with family-friendly videos on all different topics, igniting your kids’ inner creativity and playfulness. It’s everything from their favorite shows and music to learning how to build a model volcano (or make slime ;-), and everything in between.

Other important information:
Parental setup is needed to ensure the best experience possible for your kid.
Your kid may also see videos with commercial content from YouTube creators that are not paid ads.The Privacy Notice for Google Accounts managed with Family Link describes our privacy practices when your kid uses YouTube Kids with their Google Account. When your kid uses YouTube Kids without signing into their Google Account, the YouTube Kids Privacy Notice applies.

Écoutez la radio en direct, en un seul clic. Retrouvez toutes vos émissions et vos podcasts préférés, suivez l’actualité en direct et écoutez de la musique en illimité ! Rock, classique, rap, jazz, électro, pop... où que vous soyez.

ECOUTEZ LA RADIO EN DIRECT
• Ecoutez en haute définition tous vos programmes radio (France Culture, France Musique, Mouv’, FIP, France Info, France Inter…) 
• Suivez toutes les news en direct à tout moment de la journée
• Découvrez les radios musicales thématiques (classique, pop, jazz, rock… )
• Retrouvez vos émissions préférées (Affaires sensibles, Les pieds sur terre, Le moment Meurice...)

TOUTES NOS RADIOS EN UNE SEULE APPLICATION
Dans une seule et même application le meilleur de la radio du groupe Radio France et de ses partenaires. 
• France Inter : 1ère radio de France, restez informé des dernières actualités, retrouvez vos chroniques favorites (Le 7/9, La revue de presse, Boomerang, Affaires sensibles... et tous nos podcasts.)
• France Culture : plongez dans nos émissions et podcasts dédiés à la culture, la philosophie et l’art sous toutes ses formes.
• France Musique : faites confiance à la référence de la radio classique et du jazz.
• Mouv’ : radio rap, hip-hop... écoutez les dernières nouveautés hip hop et les actus du moment.
• FIP : découvrez les dernières actualités musicales jazz, pop, électro, métal, hip-hop, rock, groove et bien d'autres !
• France Info : suivez les news 24h/24, 7j/7, l'info en continu et en temps réel. La première radio d'info en France.
• France Bleu : accédez aux infos locales et à toute l’actualité de votre région.

DÉCOUVREZ TOUS NOS PODCASTS
• Explorez le plus grand catalogue de podcasts francophones : culture, art, news, sciences, histoire… Trouvez le podcast qu’il vous faut !
• Retrouvez vos émissions et chroniques préférées classées par thème ou via un moteur de recherche.

LES PODCASTS SUR L'APPLI RADIO FRANCE, UNE EXPERIENCE AUDIO PREMIUM
• Avant-premières : Ecoutez des podcasts originaux en avant-première, 7 jours avant tout le monde. 
• Archives : Retrouvez tous les épisodes des mois précédents et toutes les émissions des années passées sans limitation de date. 
• Sélection : Une sélection éditoriale quotidienne aux petits oignons, laissez-vous embarquer dans nos contenus au cœur de l’actualité, et profitez au mieux du plus grand catalogue de podcasts francophones. 
• Expérience d'écoute : Vivez l’écoute de vos podcasts dans un confort audio maximum, avec une qualité sonore supérieure (AAC). 
• Son 3D spatialisé : Et l’expérience binaurale ? Laissez-vous aussi submerger par l’innovation de certains de nos podcasts spéciaux en son 3D spatialisé. 

LE DIRECT RADIO ET TOUTES LES RADIOS MUSICALES EN QUALITÉ SUPÉRIEURE
• La musique en haute qualité : Profitez de la qualité sonore supérieure (HLS) de nos flux, particulièrement adaptée à l'écoute de toutes nos musicales, des playlists, des concerts, etc... 
• Métadonnées précises : Identifiez tout de suite quel artiste vous écoutez, album, date de sortie, pochette… tout est disponible !  
• La playlist infinie : Pas de pub pendant votre écoute du direct et des radios musicales, écoutez… à l’infini.  

NAVIGATION SIMPLIFIÉE GRÂCE À LA BIBLIOTHÈQUE
• Ajoutez des émissions en favoris pour ne louper aucun épisode, aucune émission, et sauvegardez.
• Retrouvez vos téléchargements et vos écoutes.

RADIO FRANCE DANS VOTRE VOITURE CONNECTÉE
Retrouvez sur CarPlay le direct des radios et les locales de votre région ainsi que vos podcasts favoris ou téléchargés.

DES SUGGESTIONS, DES REMARQUES ?
L'application évolue régulièrement, nous sommes à l'écoute de vos suggestions ou remarques via l'option "contact".

À bientôt sur Radio France, l’application officielle de la radio publique française.

Welcome to the world of puzzles and polygons as you are introduced to a mind-stimulating experience. This game is designed with the intent to create puzzles and let the users solve them by fitting the suitable polygon in the exact position to form an image. This mobile game is quite addictive, as players have to tussle to get past several categories and unlock more puzzle polygons. With a wide array of puzzles to solve, the player must be focused on fitting the polygons into the right slot. The polygons can be broken into a million pieces and without fitting in the right position, hours of playing can end up futile. As much as most people want to categorize the game, we would better say it's a game of grit, perseverance and will to keep pushing. 

Difficulty Level
The team at Zippi IO understand that introducing the player to a game with so much difficulty can be tricky, as, over time, they get disinterested. This is why we have put together a difficulty level that increases as you solve more puzzles. At the early stages, the challenges and poly Art puzzles are easier, but as you move along, they get tougher and more thought provoking.

Classification
The Poly Art game also has series of classifications that distinguish between each level and difficulty. For example, some classifications have poly Art puzzles where you have to unveil animals, fruits, and images of humans. So the game has been set that the more you play, the tougher the puzzles become.

Regular Update

The Poly Art Game also infuses regular updates that add more puzzles and levels to increase the user experience.

Isto é o novo aplicativo de contar pontos de tranca, buraco e canastra. Quem ja usou o antigo “Placar Tranca” conhece as funções básicas, mas alem do novo design tem mais nova funcionalidade: 

Esse aplicativo permite a contagem dos pontos dos jogos de carta como Tranca, Buraco e Canastra. 

Alem de registar o placar, o aplicativo também mostra o/a próximo/a jogador(a) a dar carta. 

Os jogadores podem ser inseridos pelo nome ou simplesmente tirando uma foto. As fotos serão armazenado no rolo de camera. 

Para registrar o resultado tem a possibilidade de compartilhar-lo com todos os jogadores. 

Alem disso o App registra todos os jogos numa tabela histórica. Assim nao resta duvida quem ganhou ou perdeu quantas vezes. 

Bom Jogo!



Como usar: 

Insere os nomes ou tire uma foto dos jogadores na sequencia que eles estão sentados na mesa. Jogador(a) 1 e o/a primeiro/a jogador(a) a dar carta. Jogador(a) 2 e o/a segundo/a e assim por diante. 

Assim é garantido que o aplicativo indica o/a jogador(a) que dará carta de cada jogo. A indicação é feito por uma moldura vermelho na foto ou letra vermelha no nome.

Quando o primeiro nome é inserido, a imagem no fundo some para deixar somente os campos para os nomes. Assim os nomes precisam ser inseridos para todos.

No outro lado, quando foi tirado a primeira foto, o campo de nome some, deixando so a foto. Assim as fotos precisam ser tirados de todos. 

Insere o nome do jogo no topo da tela inicial como por exemplo “Tranca”, “Buraco” ou “Canastra”. Esse nome será mostrado na tela de estatística/histórico ao lado de cada jogo completado e pode ser utilizado para filtrar por exemplo somente os jogos de Tranca. Caso que nenhum nome for inserido sera utilizado o nome “Jogo”.

A barra em baixo tem as seguintes funções:
Ajuda: mostra uma tela com essas instruções
Deletar: permite deletar somente o placar ou tudo
Histórico: mostrar estatística dos últimos 100 jogos
Compartilhar: mostrar a tela de resultado e compartilhar-la por e-mail, mensagem etc.



Ao abrir a janela do compartilhamento se abre um diálogo para escolher se este resultado deve ser adicionado a estatística dos últimos 100 jogos. Para compartilhar a tela do resultado usando mensagens ou e-mail aperte o botão “Compartilhar” em baixo da tela. Para voltar a tela principal aperte o “ Voltar” no topo da tela.

A estatística mostra até os 100 últimos jogos. A ordem de visualização é decrescente por data mostrando o ultimo jogo no topo da lista. Para deletar um jogo, deslize-o para esquerda. Os Ganhadores ficam destacados na lista. Para filtrar a lista por nome de jogo como por exemplo “Tranca” aperte o símbolo no topo direito e escolhe o nome do jogo na barra que aparece.

No primeiro uso das funções da barra na parte inferior da tela e ao tirar fotos dos jogadores o sistema solicitará o acesso á camera e ao rolo de camera para poder armazenar as fotos dos jogadores e da tela.

İstediğin kalitede, ücretsiz, reklamsız, istediğin yerde ve istediğin cihazda, kaldığın yerden devam et özelliği ile hiçbir şeyi yarım bırakma!


İster bilgisayardan, ister televizyondan, ister tablet veya telefondan, sevdiğin programları listene ekle, bildirimlerini aç, yeni bölümler çıkınca ilk sen izle!


TRT 1, TRT 2, TRT Belgesel, TRT Müzik, TRT Çocuk, TRT Spor, TRT Spor Yıldız, TRT Haber, TRT Avaz, TRT Türk, TRT Kurdî, TRT World ve TRT Arabi’nin canlı yayınları senin için tek bir yerde!


Canlı yayın izlemek istemiyor musun? Yüzlerce dizi, program, film ve belgesel seni bekliyor! 


Gönül Dağı, Teşkilat, Alparslan: Büyük Selçuklu, Kasaba Doktoru, Balkan Ninnisi, Yürek Çıkmazı gibi TRT'nin çok sevilen yeni dizileri anında burada!
Tekrar tekrar izlemeye doyamadığımız yerli dizilerden Leyla ile Mecnun, Diriliş Ertuğrul, Masumlar Apartmanı, Kıbrıs: Zafere Doğru, Seksenler ve Tozkoparan İskender, Beni Böyle Sev, Elimi Bırakma, Sakarya Fırat ve çok daha fazlası seni bekliyor!


Tabii nostalji sevenleri de unutmadık! Bizimkiler, Yedi Numara, Çiçek Taksi, Yeditepe İstanbul, Yaprak Dökümü, Aşk-ı Memnu, Çalıkuşu gibi efsane eski dizilere ve TRT'nin zengin arşivinden içeriklere de anında erişebilirsin.


Savaşın Efsaneleri, Geçmişin Gölgesinde, Ailenin Yeni Üyesi, Ulak, Su Savaşları, Evliya Çelebi gibi insana, doğaya ve hayata dair belgeseller; Yılmaz Erdoğan ile Öğrence, Hülya Koçyiğit ile Film Gibi Hayatlar, Pazar Gecesi Konseri, Fuat Güner ile Aramızda Müzik Var, Hayat Sanat gibi TRT’nin gözde kültür sanat programları, belgesel ve söyleşileri de burada!


Türkiye'nin en güvenilir çocuk kanalı TRT Çocuk'un birbirinden sevimli ve kaliteli çizgi filmleri de burada! Rafadan Tayfa, Keloğlan, Doru, Pırıl, Niloya gibi çocukların göz bebeği çizgi filmler yeni bölümleriyle TRT İzle’de!


Haydi ne duruyorsun? Hemen TRT İzle'yi indir ve binlerce içeriği keyfince izlemeye başla!

The Phil27 app is designed for everybody up to the age of 27 and helps you get more out of your concert experience at Philharmonie Luxembourg: discover the best upcoming events at the concert hall, from classical music, live cinema, jazz, world music to electro and buy on the go your tickets at the special price of 10 €.

Powered by POST Luxembourg, the Phil27 concert tickets and app enable the next generation to easily explore music through live concerts. Thanks to POST, concertgoers up to the age of 27 (or aged 27 and younger) can easily benefit from a favourable rate of only 10 € per ticket.

Available seats can be easily booked by using the app on the day of the concert from 10 am until 1 hour before the concert or directly at the box office from 1 hour prior to the concert.

What does Phil27 do?
•	Discover upcoming events: stay in the know on what’s going on today, this week, this weekend… 
•	Buy tickets wherever you are and keep them handy on your mobile device to make check-in nice and easy: the app is the most straightforward way to book the 10 € special price tickets on the day of the concert.
•	Add upcoming events to your calendar: save an event you wish to attend to your personal calendar with just one click.
•	Wish list: keep tabs on all your favorite up-coming concerts and never miss an event or the start of the sales. To add an event to your list of favourites, just press the heart button.
•	Explore music through a vast selection of concerts: with our thematic worlds, discover great events you might otherwise have missed
•	Share events with your friends on social media, Emails…

Our tip: Activate the push notifications to always be kept up to date about when tickets go on sale.

Terms of use:
E-tickets are only available via the app from 10 am on the day of the concert until 1 hour before the concert**. On the wished date, click on the ticket button and simply and easily complete your ticket purchase on the day of the event (1 ticket per person). The button is only activated during the sales period.
For people up to 27 years only  (or aged 27 and younger): please provide a valid ID with your ticket at the entrance of the concert hall. 
**depending on availability

The AsteraNext offers intuitive and fast control of complex lighting setups of current and upcoming Astera products. It provides fully customizable programs and effects and also it is designed to work seamlessly with other control methods. It can set up DMX addresses and footprints for CRMX control. In addition, lamps can be diagnosed, updated or reset from the AsteraNext.

Here are some of the features:

Layer Effects
It is now easier than ever to control pixels of your Astera lights and create complex effects.

CRMX Support
That would make it much easier for customers to understand how the DMX works, also easier to operate the CRMX module.

Talkback+ 
Detect all available lights, set them up, check their status, configure DMX addresses and DMX profiles.

Seamless Runtime 
Set the length of your production and be sure that your lights won`t run out while still getting the maximum brightness.

Effects 
Quickly build programs out of colors and effects, trigger them or make them match a beat.

Targets 
Quickly create groups of lights, assign positions and select which lights should receive commands.

Scheduled StandBy
Switch lights into power-saving standby and schedule them to wake up when the production starts.

Dynamic PowerBoost
This exclusive feature makes the light able to display the maximum brightness at all time and intensify non-white colors.

Green/Magenta Correction
Adjust green/magenta during content creation to reduce postproduction work.

Emergency Lights
Switches to white light when AC power is cut to keep your event save

DJ Feature
Auto BPM analyzes the beat and matches programs to it, flash buttons can trigger special effects while being held down.

Other Features
The AsteraNext is packed with many additional items and new features are frequently added via software update.

Each cat has their own unique vocabulary that they use to communicate with their owners consistently when in the same context. For example, a cat can have their own distinct meow for “food” or for “let me out.” This is not necessarily a cat language, as cats do not share the same meows to communicate the same things with each other, but we can use Machine Learning to recognise an individual cat’s meows and translate that into a human readable language. MeowTalk gives your cat a voice!

Using Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence to decode cat communications, MeowTalk instantaneously interprets cat talk into one of eleven general cat intents; the intents represent cat moods and states of mind and are as follows:

- Happy/Content
- Defense
- Angry
- Attack
- Mother Call
- Mating Call
- In Pain
- Resting
- Hunting
- Warning
- Give Me Attention

The free app version includes access to the translation mode with three basic meow intents. If you use the free version and your cat's meow does not belong to one of the free intents, it will be blurred. MeowTalk Premium subscription allows you to access all meow intents and translations. 

MeowTalk Premium also allows you to train the app to learn your cat’s unique vocabulary, use Auto-translate mode, keep track of your cat’s meow translation history, and store the precious audio recordings of the meows on your device. 

Each cat also has a unique vocabulary of meows. With a Premium subscription, you can train the MeowTalk app to learn your cat’s unique vocabulary of meows by telling the app what each meow means when your cat makes it. To train the app to learn a specific meow, pick a context where you know with certainty what your cat is trying to say (e.g. at feeding time the cat is saying “food”, at the door the cat is saying “let me out”). Use the app to translate those meows. You will get one of the 11 general intents as a translation - select “No, Change it”, and then provide the correct translation. Repeat this 5 to 10 times and wait up to 24 hours for the app to update and learn your cat’s vocabulary.

MeowTalk Premium includes an ability to turn your old phone into a smart speaker for cats when you run MeowTalk on it in MeowRoom mode. MeowRoom continuous cat listening can be activated in a MeowTalk app installed on an older or spare smartphone plugged into the wall outlet, so this smart cat speaker always listens for and translates cat meows. Any primary phone logged in with the same MeowTalk account will also get a notification of the meow translation captured by MeowRoom, which enables users to enjoy cat meow moments even when they are not home. 

Reach out to the MeowTalk Team anytime with ideas or issues at info@meowtalk.app

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bYNk0fDMtdo
https://www.nytimes.com/2022/08/29/science/cats-pets-ommunication-artificial-intelligence.html

https://www.meowtalk.app/privacy-policy

MeowTalk Subscription is a monthly subscription service that allows you to remove the blurred translations and network ads, access the meow translation history, download the audio recordings, use MeowRoom mode, and more. Subscription costs 2.99 USD/month (or local equivalent) and will be charged to your iTunes Account after purchase and when the subscription renews monthly.

Subscriptions will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Track your stats in League of Legends, Valorant, Fortnite, R6: Siege, Call of Duty Warzone, Battlefield 2042, Apex Legends, Destiny 2, Rocket League and Halo Infinite. Easily switch between games with the tap of a button. This stats tracker is the ideal companion to keep an eye on your performance.

Every game we support has great features that get to the core of player performance:

LEADERBOARDS: Track the top players by rank, K/D and more.
See who ranks among the best in the world. We rank players by the most valuable stats by default, but we offer a broad range of filters for each game. See who's the best in your region. Valorant leaderboards can be filtered by region and episode.

MY PROFILE: Sign In to get a more personalized experience.
Sign in and you'll receive a session report when you've finished playing. Session Reports offer insight into your performance over your recent matches and include helpful tips for improvement. R6: Siege profiles show stats summaries for every season including MMR.

OVERVIEW/SKILL RATING: View a summary of a player based on their recent matches.
Our overview pages include graphs and allow you to filter data by season, playlists, stats, characters and more. League of Legends shows detailed champion masteries, including LP gains and losses for specific champions, laning stats vs. opponents and more.

RECENT MATCHES: Track details about matches you've played recently.
Every game we support has a custom match details view that shows you valuable information about the matches we've tracked. Usually this includes a roster, post-match stats, player ratings, performance graphs and more. Valorant matches show a detailed breakdown of your team's economy. Tap a player to view their profile.

FAVORITES: Save player profiles for easy access later.
Favorites can be saved for every game we support. They appear on the Favorites page, and when searching for players for quick access. The Favorites page makes it easy to compare yourself to friends and foes.

Every game we support brings something unique to the table. Below are some unique features you can find in our app.

League of Legends:
- Champion Tier Lists, Recommended Builds, Matchup Statistics, Ability Previews, Skins and Lore
- Live Match roster + ranks
- Match reports with damage and gold graphs, player ranks, and builds
- LP gains and losses over time in Solo and Flex queues
- Champion mastery details including LP changes for specific champions, best and worst matchups, and your "Laning @ 14 mins" stats, which are the same stats used to track pros' performance

Fortnite:
- View daily shop and get optional notifications when the shop updates
- Fortnite Events: track your team's movements in tournaments in real time and view upcoming events in the calendar
- View Fortnite Tracker's Power Rankings in the profile Events tab and see how your PR is improving over time
- Fortnite esports news

R6: Siege:
- View Operator insights: see the best attackers and defenders in the current meta
- Seasonal breakdowns of various stats including Max MMR, win rate and much more
- MMR history: View changes in your MMR by match as they happen
- Personal operator performance including K/D, win rate, headshot %, time played and more

Warzone:
- View detailed breakdowns of every lobby you play in including lobby K/D and stats for every player in the lobby

Valorant:
- Detailed match history and match reports with graphs and player comparisons
- View your top agents and track stats including win rate, time played, K/D and more

Apex:
- Legend Insights: See what legends are dominating the current meta
- Personal legend performance: Track your performance for each legend you play

Rocket League:
- Detailed MMR tracking for every playlist
- Daily performance graphs and tracking
- View MMR changes per match

Destiny 2:
- Trials Lookup gives you a really great breakdown of Trials Fireteams
- Elo tracking for each match and every playlist

Get the latest EuroMillions results within seconds of the draw taking place. This easy to use app shows the EuroMillions numbers (including associated draws like the Millionaire Maker, Irish Raffle and EuroMillions Plus) and full prize breakdowns including number of winners and prizes paid. 


The following features are also included:


QR Ticket Scanner (UK only)
--------------------------------------
For lottery tickets purchased in UK shops, simply scan the QR code printed on your ticket using your phone’s camera to see if you have won a prize.


Ticket Checker
--------------------------------------
Enter and save your chosen numbers to see if you have won or to see how often they have come up in the past. You can also label your tickets – great if you play multiple lines or if you run a syndicate. The ticket checker also highlights prizes won on each ticket. Only play EuroMillions on certain days every Friday or Tuesday? Not a problem, you can exclude your checked tickets from draws you do not play.


Customisable Notifications
--------------------------------------
Get notified instantly when the latest EuroMillions results and prize breakdowns become available. Want to know when the jackpot has rolled over or has reached a certain amount? Just head to the Notification section of the app to set up your alerts. There is also the option to set notifications at times that suit you - great for reminding you to purchase tickets before the draw.


Random Number Generator
--------------------------------------
Stuck for numbers? Use this handy tool and let the app choose your numbers rather than having to rely on Lucky Dip numbers!


EuroMillions Results Archive
--------------------------------------
Access to the full archive of results dating back to the first draw which took place in 2004. 


Multilingual Support
--------------------------------------
This app is available in the following languages: English, French, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch, Chinese, German, Italian, Polish, Swedish and Russian.


Support
--------------------------------------
If you have any feedback or suggestions on how we can improve this app, please get in touch at support@euro-millions.com.
